TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SessionStateUtility extends System.Object
public ref class SessionStateUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供会话状态模块和会话状态存储提供程序使用的 Helper 方法，为 ASP.NET 应用程序管理会话信息。

span.span: Provides helper methods used by session-state modules and session-state store providers to manage session information for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供会话状态模块或会话状态存储提供程序使用的静态帮助器方法。The class provides static helper methods that are used by a session-state module or a session-state store provider. 应用程序开发人员不需要从代码中调用这些方法。Application developers will not need to call these methods from their code. 下表描述了会话状态模块和会话状态存储提供程序使用方法的方式。The following table describes the ways the session-state module and session-state store provider use the methods. |方法Method|使用Use| |------------|---------| | 方法 method|自定义会话状态模块可用于检索现有会话的会话信息或为新会话创建会话信息。Can be used by custom session-state modules to either retrieve session information for an existing session or create session information for a new session.| | 方法 method|由会话状态模块调用, 以将会话数据添加到当前 , 并通过属性将其提供给应用程序代码使用。Called by the session-state module to add the session data to the current and make it available to application code through the property.| | 方法 method|在请求结束时, 在或事件的过程中由会话状态模块调用, 以清除当前的会话数据。Called by the session-state module during the or events at the end of a request, to clear session data from the current .| | 方法 method|由会话状态模块调用, 以获取对基于 global.asax 文件中定义的对象的集合的引用。Called by the session-state module to get a reference to the collection based on objects defined in the Global.asax file. 返回的集合包含在添加到当前的会话数据中。 The collection returned is included with the session data added to the current .| 会话数据 作为对象或接口的任何有效实现传递到当前或从当前检索。Session data is passed to and retrieved from the current as an object or any valid implementation of the interface. 有关实现会话状态存储提供程序的信息, 请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For information about implementing a session-state store provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个自定义会话状态模块实现, 它使用将会话信息存储在内存中。The following code example shows a custom session-state module implementation that stores session information in memory using a . 模块使用类引用当前和, 检索当前, 并引发 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中定义的**Session_OnEnd**事件。The module uses the class to reference the current and , retrieve the current , and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 此应用程序不会阻止同时进行的 Web 请求使用相同的会话标识符。This application does not prevent simultaneous Web requests from using the same session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#1)] 若要在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用此自定义会话状态模块, 可以替换 web.config 文件中的现有引用, 如下面的示例中所示。To use this custom session-state module in an ASP.NET application, you can replace the existing reference in the Web.config file, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.span: 要在其中添加 对象的 对象。

span.span: The object to which to add the object.

span.span: The implementation instance to add to the specified HTTP context.

summary.span: 把会话数据应用到当前请求的上下文。

span.span: Applies the session data to the context for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态模块使用方法将会话数据应用于当前请求。The method is used by a session-state module to apply session data to the current request. 在请求开始时发生事件时, 会发生这种情况。This occurs during the event at the beginning of a request. 为现有会话检索当前请求的会话数据或者为新会话创建会话数据。Session data for the current request is either retrieved for an existing session or created for a new session. 然后, 将在与当前 一起传递给方法的实现实例中封装会话数据。The session data is then encapsulated in an implementation instance, which is passed to the method along with the current . 然后, 提供的会话数据将通过当前上下文的属性提供给应用程序代码。The supplied session data is then made available to application code through the property of the current context. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义会话状态模块中的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 自定义模块检索现有会话信息, 或创建新的会话信息, 并使用方法将其添加到当前请求的。The custom module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information and uses the method to add it to the of the current request. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

exception.span: 当前会话的 对象已添加到指定的 。

span.span: An object for the current session has already been added to the specified .

param.span: 要从中检索会话数据的 。

span.span: The from which to retrieve session data.

summary.span: 从当前请求的上下文检索会话数据。

span.span: Retrieves session data from the context for the current request.

returns.span: 根据当前请求填充了会话数据的 实现实例。

span.span: An implementation instance populated with session data from the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态模块可以使用方法从当前请求检索会话数据。The method can be used by a session-state module to retrieve session data from the current request. 在请求结束时事件发生。This occurs during the event at the end of a request. 然后, 可以将返回的会话数据写入会话数据存储区。The returned session data can then be written to the session data store. 如果该会话已被放弃, 则可以从数据存储区中删除会话数据, 并且可以执行**Session_OnEnd**事件。If the session has been abandoned, the session data can be removed from the data store and , and the **Session_OnEnd** event can be executed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义会话状态模块中的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 模块使用方法检索当前请求的的会话数据。The module retrieves session data from the for the current request using the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]

para.span: 您可以使用方法从内部存储中删除会话数据, 并使用方法来引发事件。

span.span: You can use the method to remove session data from the internal store, and the method to raise the event.

param.span: 要从其中获取静态对象集合的 。

span.span: Gets a reference to the static objects collection for the specified context.

returns.span: 填充了指定 的 属性值的 集合。

span.span: An collection populated with the property value for the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于检索 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中定义的静态对象的集合。The method is used to retrieve the collection of static objects defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 会话状态模块实现将 向使用方法添加到当前上下文的实现实例提供返回的集合。A session-state module implementation will supply the returned collection to the implementation instance that is added to the current context using the method. 在创建 对象时, 还可以使用方法。A can also use the method when creating a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义会话状态模块中的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 模块检索现有会话信息或创建新的会话信息, 包括 从方法返回的集合, 并将其添加到当前请求的。The module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information, including the collection returned from the method, and adds it to the of the current request. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序执行 Global.asax 文件中定义的 Session_OnEnd 事件。

span.span: Executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话状态模块使用 方法来执行在ASP.NET应用程序的global.asax文件中定义的Session_OnEnd事件。The method is used by a session-state module to execute the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 当已放弃某个会话时, 或者如果该会话过期, 则会话状态模块将调用方法。A session-state module will call the method when a session has been abandoned, or if the session expires. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义会话状态模块中的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 如果已放弃该会话, 则该模块将使用 方法执行应用程序的 global.asax 文件中定义的 Session_OnEnd 事件。If the session has been abandoned, the module executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the application using the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的中清除会话数据。 The method clears session data from the specified . 会话状态模块将在 事件的处理程序中调用方法。A session-state module will call the method in the handler for the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义会话状态模块中的事件的处理程序。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 该事件处理程序从当前中删除会话数据。The event handler removes session data from the current . 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
